roleset.name: exchange of phosphate groups between organic phosphates, without their going through the stage of inorganic phosphates

example.name: all ARGs
example.text: Intestinal alkaline phosphatase (IAP) purified from calf intestine effectively transphosphorylated thiamin (T) to thiamin monophosphate (TMP) using Na2-beta-glycerophosphate or Na2-creatine phosphate.
example.arg: Intestinal alkaline phosphatase (IAP) purified from calf intestine
